## SentFluidTransaction.getReceipt() method

Check whether the transaction has been mined, and whether it was successful.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
getReceipt(): Promise<T>;
```
<b>Returns:</b>

Promise&lt;T&gt;

## Remarks

Unlike [waitForReceipt()](./lib-base.sentfluidtransaction.waitforreceipt.md)<!-- -->, this function doesn't wait for the transaction to be mined.
